fishFeed.name: Prestige Premium Floating Feed
fishFeed.description: High-quality floating feed for a variety of fish species.
fishFeed.ingredients: Fishmeal, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
fishFeed.usage: Feed multiple times a day, allowing fish to consume within a few minutes.

fishFeed.name: Prestige Premium Aquatic Feed
fishFeed.description: Nutritious feed designed for optimal growth of aquatic species.
fishFeed.ingredients: Fishmeal, soybean meal, corn, vitamins, minerals
fishFeed.usage: Feed according to the feeding guidelines provided based on the species and size of fish.

fishFeed.name: Prestige Premium Common Carp Feed
fishFeed.description: Specialized feed formulated for common carp.
fishFeed.ingredients: Fishmeal, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
fishFeed.usage: Feed multiple times a day, adjusting the quantity based on the carp's appetite.

fishFeed.name: Prestige Premium Shrimp Feed
fishFeed.description: Optimal feed for promoting healthy growth of shrimp.
fishFeed.ingredients: Shrimp meal, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
fishFeed.usage: Feed small amounts several times a day, ensuring thorough consumption.

fishFeed.name: Prestige Premium Tilapia Feed
fishFeed.description: Specific feed to support the growth and development of tilapia.
fishFeed.ingredients: Fishmeal, soybean meal, corn, vitamins, minerals
fishFeed.usage: Feed according to the recommended feeding rates based on tilapia size and water conditions.

fishFeed.name: Prestige Premium Common (Koi, Horn and Magur) Feed
fishFeed.description: Balanced feed for common fish species like Koi, Horn, and Magur.
fishFeed.ingredients: Fishmeal, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
fishFeed.usage: Feed multiple times a day, adjusting the amount based on fish activity and growth.

fishFeed.name: Prestige Premium (Pabda, Gulsha and Carp) Feed
fishFeed.description: High-quality feed suitable for Pabda, Gulsha, and Carp fish.
fishFeed.ingredients: Fishmeal, soybean meal, corn, vitamins, minerals
fishFeed.usage: Feed as per the recommended feeding rates provided for optimal fish health and growth.
